I write (mostly) about emerging medical AI for clinicians and about medicine for data scientists. My goal is to help us actualise AI for medicine, from biomedical research to clinical practice, for the safe and productive merge of data science and medicine.

Other interests include complex systems, modelling and computational psychiatry
